feed.title: ShellHub Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for ShellHub: v0.13.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • refactor(client): remove build URL function and increase, simplify reverse listener creation and package strucuture by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3190
  • ui: bump @rushstack/eslint-patch from 1.5.1 to 1.6.0 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3314
  • ui: bump font-logos from 1.0.0 to 1.1.1 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3313
  • ui: bump @sentry/tracing from 7.80.1 to 7.81.1 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3312
  • ui: bump @types/node from 18.18.10 to 18.18.13 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3311
  • ui: bump @vue/runtime-dom from 3.3.7 to 3.3.9 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3310
  • refactor(connman): restructure ConnectionManager and introduce SyncSliceMap by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3316
  • Fix/pagination parameters by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3315
  • chore(revdial): add keep-alive timeout by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3318
  • chore(revdial): improve listener termination by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3320
  • Fix/auth token by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3319
  • docker: ui: bump node from 21.2.0-alpine3.17 to 21.3.0-alpine3.17 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3325
  • ui: bump @types/webfontloader from 1.6.36 to 1.6.38 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3326
  • ui: bump @fortawesome/free-regular-svg-icons from 6.4.2 to 6.5.1 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3327
  • ui: bump @fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons from 6.4.2 to 6.5.1 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3328
  • ui: bump vuetify from 3.4.2 to 3.4.4 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3329
  • ui: bump vue-tsc from 1.8.22 to 1.8.24 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3330
  • api: bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.15.0 to 0.16.0 in /api by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3331
  • docker: agent: bump alpine from 3.18.4 to 3.18.5 in /agent by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3332
  • docker: api: bump alpine from 3.18.4 to 3.18.5 in /api by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3333
  • docker: ssh: bump alpine from 3.18.4 to 3.18.5 in /ssh by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3334
  • ssh: bump golang.org/x/net from 0.18.0 to 0.19.0 in /ssh by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3335
  • docker: cli: bump alpine from 3.18.4 to 3.18.5 in /cli by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3337
  • fix(agent): do not set device as online due auth request by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3321
  • feat: introduce a keep-alive system using ping-pong WebSocket messages by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3324
  • fix: removed unused keepalive chan by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3338
  • test(connman): include test in the syncsslipemaps by @danyecls in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3317
  • fix(ui): device list not maintaining search filters on pagination by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3340

Full Changelog: https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/compare/v0.13.5...v0.13.6

entry.title: New release for ShellHub: v0.14.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • refactor api's wokers by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3323
  • refactor(agent): add modes to agent by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3271
  • fix session authentication issues in older agent versions by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3143
  • feature(api,pkg): add validation rule to device's name by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3341
  • chore(api): remove verbose logs by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3342
  • chore(api,cli,pkg): remove deprecated function on validator package by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3343
  • chore(pkg,client): remove http client from required mocks on api's client tests by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3358
  • docker: ssh: bump alpine from 3.18.5 to 3.19.0 in /ssh by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3357
  • docker: api: bump alpine from 3.18.5 to 3.19.0 in /api by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3356
  • docker: agent: bump alpine from 3.18.5 to 3.19.0 in /agent by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3355
  • docker: cli: bump alpine from 3.18.5 to 3.19.0 in /cli by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3354
  • docker: ui: bump node from 21.3.0-alpine3.17 to 21.4.0-alpine3.17 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3353
  • ui: bump @vue/test-utils from 2.4.1 to 2.4.3 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3350
  • ui: bump @fortawesome/fontawesome-free from 6.4.2 to 6.5.1 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3348
  • ui: bump @vue/runtime-dom from 3.3.9 to 3.3.11 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3347
  • ui: bump @types/node from 18.18.13 to 18.19.3 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3345
  • ui: bump terser from 5.19.4 to 5.26.0 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3349
  • cli: bump go.mongodb.org/mongo-driver from 1.13.0 to 1.13.1 in /cli by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3352
  • api: bump go.mongodb.org/mongo-driver from 1.13.0 to 1.13.1 in /api by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3346
  • chore(deps): bump actions/setup-go from 4 to 5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3351
  • chore(ui): update node version from 21.3.0 to 21.4.0 by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3359
  • chore(cli,ui,pkg): set more strict rules for user validation by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3360
  • fix(api): avoid error when nothing is updated on user data request by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3361
  • chore(api): organize fixtures initialization by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3339
  • Simplifying member discovery with a new namespace method by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3365
  • fix(gateway): fix "worker_connections are not enough" error by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3373
  • chore(gateway): update letsencrypt root path in shellhub.conf by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3374
  • ui: bump @vue/eslint-config-airbnb from 7.0.0 to 7.0.1 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3371
  • ui: bump @fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons from 6.4.2 to 6.5.1 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3372
  • ui: bump typescript from 5.2.2 to 5.3.3 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3370
  • ui: bump @types/node-rsa from 1.1.2 to 1.1.4 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3369
  • ui: bump yup from 1.3.2 to 1.3.3 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3368
  • chore(deps): bump actions/download-artifact from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3367
  • chore(deps): bump actions/upload-artifact from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3366
  • feat(api): implementing MFA two-factor authentication by @danyecls in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3078
  • api: bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.16.0 to 0.17.0 in /api by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3375
  • ssh: bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.16.0 to 0.17.0 in /ssh by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3376
  • agent: bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.14.0 to 0.17.0 in /agent by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3377
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.14.0 to 0.17.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3378
  • fix(ssh): call right route to close session by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3381
  • chore(ssh): add replace for local shellhub version by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3382
  • api: bump github.com/labstack/echo/v4 from 4.11.3 to 4.11.4 in /api by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3391
  • ssh: bump github.com/gliderlabs/ssh from 0.3.5 to 0.3.6 in /ssh by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3390
  • ssh: bump github.com/labstack/echo/v4 from 4.11.3 to 4.11.4 in /ssh by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3389
  • ui: bump @sentry/tracing from 7.81.1 to 7.91.0 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3388
  • ui: bump vue-tsc from 1.8.24 to 1.8.26 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3386
  • ui: bump @vue/runtime-dom from 3.3.11 to 3.3.13 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3385
  • ui: bump eslint-plugin-vue from 9.18.1 to 9.19.2 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3384
  • ui: bump @sentry/vue from 7.77.0 to 7.91.0 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3397
  • ui: bump @vue/runtime-dom from 3.3.13 to 3.4.3 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3396
  • ui: bump vue-tsc from 1.8.26 to 1.8.27 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3395
  • ssh: bump github.com/go-resty/resty/v2 from 2.10.0 to 2.11.0 in /ssh by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3393
  • ui: bump @rushstack/eslint-patch from 1.6.0 to 1.6.1 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3394
  • chore(deps): replace satori/go.uuid with google/uuid by @Juneezee in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3392
  • Abstract JWT logic into a new package by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3364
  • fix(wsconnadapter): prevent nil channel write in Close method by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3400
  • ui: bump vee-validate from 4.11.8 to 4.12.4 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3398
  • chore(api): rename store files removing sufix _store by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3363
  • feat(ssh): enable profiling in development mode by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3402
  • ssh(refactor): remove asynq initialization from main by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3406
  • api fix devices tags update by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3405
  • chore(ui): update node dependencies versions by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3407
  • chore(qa): update node version on QA by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3408
  • ui: bump @types/node from 18.19.3 to 18.19.5 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3410
  • ui: bump @fortawesome/fontawesome-svg-core from 6.4.2 to 6.5.1 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3412
  • ui: bump @sentry/tracing from 7.91.0 to 7.92.0 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3413
  • ui: bump @sentry/vue from 7.91.0 to 7.92.0 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3414
  • ui: bump moment from 2.29.4 to 2.30.1 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3411
  • fix(ui): tag list not reacting to new props by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3401
  • fix(ui): profile settings edit tags wrongfully showing not chosen tags by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3415
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/go-resty/resty/v2 from 2.10.0 to 2.11.0 in /connector by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3416
  • ui: bump follow-redirects from 1.15.2 to 1.15.4 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3418
  • Fix some errors and standardize tag operations in the store by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3409
  • fix(api): return the right error when no resource is matched by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3419
  • fix(gateway): provide missing value for webroot-path in certbot renew cmd by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3421
  • chore: bump shellhub version to v0.14.0-rc.1 by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3422
  • fix(ssh): init cache to enable web connection work by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3423
  • chore: bump shellhub version to v0.14.0-rc.2 by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3424
  • fix(gateway): correcting access to cloud-to-enterprise routes by @danyecls in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3425
  • chore: bump shellhub version to v0.14.0-rc.3 by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3426
  • fix: container id checking by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3429
  • fix(ui): multi-factor authentication store methods by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3428
  • fix(api): add verification if the user with active MFA has the MFA vaâ€¦ by @danyecls in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3427
  • feat(ui): new mfa client generate by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3430
  • fix(gateway): add recovery location block on auth by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3432
  • chore: bump shellhub version to v0.14.0-rc.4 by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3431
  • ssh: bump golang.org/x/net from 0.19.0 to 0.20.0 in /ssh by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3433
  • api: bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.17.0 to 0.18.0 in /api by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3441
  • ui: bump sass from 1.69.5 to 1.69.7 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3435
  • ui: bump axios from 1.6.2 to 1.6.5 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3436
  • ui: bump vuetify from 3.4.9 to 3.4.10 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3437
  • ui: bump @vue/runtime-dom from 3.4.5 to 3.4.13 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3438
  • ui: bump @types/node from 18.19.5 to 18.19.7 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3439
  • api: bump github.com/getsentry/sentry-go from 0.25.0 to 0.26.0 in /api by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3440
  • chore: bump shellhub version to v0.14.0-rc.5 by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3442
  • fix(ui): added margin to qr-code generator on Multi-Factor Authentication by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3443
  • chore: bump shellhub version to v0.14.0-rc.6 by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3444
  • fix(ui): added router guard to redirect mfa url back to login by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3446
  • chore: bump shellhub version to v0.14.0-rc.7 by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3447
  • chore: bump shellhub version to v0.14.0 by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3448

New Contributors

  • @Juneezee made their first contribution in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3392

Full Changelog: https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/compare/v0.13.6...v0.14.0

entry.title: New release for ShellHub: v0.14.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: bump shellhub version to v0.14.1 by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3450

Full Changelog: https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/compare/v0.14.0...v0.14.1

entry.title: New release for ShellHub: v0.14.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(ssh): send IP to firewall when ssh wihtout session is requested by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3455
  • bump(ui): update vite to 5.0.1 by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3452
  • fix(ssh): let client decide whether can connect to a device that has a potentially broken version or not. by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3454
  • ui: bump vite from 5.0.11 to 5.0.12 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3457
  • ui: bump terser from 5.26.0 to 5.27.0 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3459
  • ui: bump @rushstack/eslint-patch from 1.6.1 to 1.7.0 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3460
  • ui: bump dotenv from 16.3.1 to 16.3.2 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3461
  • ui: bump eslint-plugin-vue from 9.19.2 to 9.20.1 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3462
  • fix(ui): warning on watcher callback on v-overlay loading screen by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3468
  • fix(ui): added class to center loading on appLayout by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3471
  • fix(ui): create store meant to be used only by NewConnection list by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3472
  • fix docker compose binary by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3473
  • config: bump shellhub version to v0.14.2 by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3475

Full Changelog: https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/compare/v0.14.1...v0.14.2

entry.title: New release for ShellHub: v0.14.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • refactor api queries by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3420
  • refactor(ssh,ui): use messages for web ssh connection by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3463
  • docker: agent: bump alpine from 3.19.0 to 3.19.1 in /agent by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3480
  • docker: cli: bump alpine from 3.19.0 to 3.19.1 in /cli by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3481
  • docker: ssh: bump alpine from 3.19.0 to 3.19.1 in /ssh by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3482
  • docker: api: bump alpine from 3.19.0 to 3.19.1 in /api by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3483
  • ui: bump @rushstack/eslint-patch from 1.7.0 to 1.7.2 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3484
  • ui: bump vuetify from 3.4.10 to 3.5.1 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3486
  • chore(deps): bump dorny/paths-filter from 2 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3489
  • ui: bump @vue/test-utils from 2.4.3 to 2.4.4 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3488
  • ui: bump @sentry/tracing from 7.92.0 to 7.98.0 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3485
  • feat(ui): mfa recovery login redirect to disabling dialog by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3491
  • normalize per_page by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3492
  • Add missing healthcheck entries by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3477
  • ui: bump axios from 1.6.5 to 1.6.7 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3487
  • add ';' at the end of the gateway health check return statement by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3496
  • chore: define env variable to gateway bind address by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3495
  • fix device update by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3501
  • config: bump shellhub version to v0.14.3-rc.1 by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3502
  • fix(agent): don't send trash to SFTP when agent is running on host by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3509
  • config: bump shellhub version to v0.14.3 by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3510

Full Changelog: https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/compare/v0.14.2...v0.14.3
